title: 2019-03-11 - Researcher Claims Iranian APT Behind 6TB Data Heist at Citrix

## Discussion


-----

I think GAL should be Global Address List versus Global Access List.

"Intriguingly, the firm claimed that the attackers made of with a host of Citrix enterprise
network data" should be "...attackers made off with a host of..."

Thanks for letting us know!
